review: Did not realize the stick needed to be plugged into a power supply. It appeared to be more mobile. Enjoy the selection of movies and function of device.

review: Great product, easy to set up and more current movies than Netflix.

review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick exceeded all my expectations, it is truly amazing ! 😎

review: Amazing piece of electronics, very user friendly and provides an abundance of entertainment.

review: I love the fire tv stick. It has all of my favorite apps and so easy to navigate.

review: Live this!  It's so easy to use and instant access.

review: Great, easy to install and program.  Get it.  You'll be happy you did.
